titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Delaware Valley Paleontological Society is a nonprofit educational organization chartered in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. Founded in 1978, its purpose is "to promote the gathering and dissemination of information pertaining to fossil forms." Its monthly meetings are usually held at the Academy of Natural Sciences.

scopecontent.p: This collection of records of the Delaware Valley Paleontological Society consists of: photocopies of the original letter proposing the formation of a fossil club, a postcard from the beginning of the DVPS, photocopies of newsletters and flyers, a photocopy of a 1983 bibliography of the DVPS reference collection, and photocopied membership lists.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
